topic.title: Key Features and Benefits of the SDK

body.p: The SDK allows you to extend the functionality of XML Editor, XML Author, XML Developer both as standalone applications and as Eclipse plugins. The SDK also contains Java components that enable you to build your own application incorporating functionality, including standalone applications or Java applets. The Web Application is also part of the SDK and allows you to provide XML editing and review capabilities inside web browsers both on mobile and desktop devices.
